title: FT: Mathewson & Chase - American Beauty, Tolstoi, Sovereign (3 cards)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FT: Mathewson & Chase - American Beauty, Tolstoi, Sovereign (3 cards)
posts.post_content:
I have a nice trio that is available for trade. I hope to move them as a group if possible. Feel free to PM me or email me at: t206society@gmail.com for scans if you are interested and have a trade list.

Thank you.

Derek

1.) Christy Mathewson "portrait" - Sovereign 150 (SGC 2)

2.) Hal Chase "portrait; blue" - American Beauty 350 framed (SGC 1.5)

3.) Hal Chase "portrait; blue" - Tolstoi (SGC 2)
